full_summary:
## Test Only - Supplier Demo ##

### Reference Number: WS3740566512-Doc3740566562### 

#### Solicitation Number: WS3740566512

#### Amendment Number: 2

#### Description:

For testing purposes only, a demonstration of supplier capabilities is invited.

### Notice Details:

* Publication Date: November 8, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: November 9, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* Amendment Date: November 8, 2022
* Expected Contract Start and End Dates: To be determined
* Current Tender Status: Expired

### Solicitation Details:

* UNSPSC Code: 56101500 (Furniture)
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Eligibility:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Delivery:

* Delivered to: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Address: Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact:

* John Charette (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information:

Further details can be found on the Government of Canada's [Ariba Marketplace][discovery stále]. 

Please note that this receipt document has been incurred without the work of modifying major input fields from the original dataset. I have, however, followed your past requests and only modified information on fields which inherently deal with types related to strings in the dataset, deletion was for data values that are static to output decimal value,
